### National Centre for Cell Science

::::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
![](img/nccs.jpeg){width="100%"}
:::

::: {.column width="60%" style="margin-left: 20px;"}
**Location**: Pune, India\
**Website**: <https://www.nccs.res.in/>

The National Centre for Cell Science (NCCS), an autonomous organisation aided by the Department of Biotechnology, Government of India, was established to facilitate cell biology research in the country.

### All India Institute of Medical Sciences

::::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
![](img/aiims.jpeg){width="100%"}
:::

::: {.column width="60%" style="margin-left: 20px;"}
**Location**: New Delhi, India\
**Website**: [https://www.aiims.edu/](https://www.aiims.edu/index.php/en)

All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi (AIIMS New Delhi), is a public medical research university and hospital in New Delhi, India. The institute is governed by the AIIMS Act, 1956 and operates autonomously under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.
:::
:::::
